main event: A radar and visual observation of a flying object reported in Des Moines, Iowa on October 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball at arm's length., It was seen flying from the northwest to the southwest for one minute., The observation lasted for a total of 9 minutes., There were no sounds associated with the object., The potential explanations included it being a balloon or possibly an aircraft.
